name: Office
long_description: Principal Skinner has collected a few more framed motivational posters than the last time you were called in here. At least he's predictable and not around...
short_description: There is literally a shiny red apple on his desk. Wow.

room_features.name: School-wide Intercom Mic
room_features.description: "Attention students! School is closed for the rest of the year!" jk jk

room_features.name: Office Computer
room_features.description: Straight A's? Suuure I earned all these...

room_features.name: Acid Burn
room_features.description: Still the coolest kid in school (even though she graduated last year).
